params.target: Address of the receiver (community or treasury)                    or address of the DonationMiner contract otherwise

params.newDecayDenominator: New decayDenominator value For further information regarding each parameter, see *DonationMiner* smart contract initialize method.

returns._0: uint256 sum of all donor's rewards that has not been claimed

params._lastPeriodNumber: last reward period number to be computed

returns._0: uint256 sum of all donor's rewards that has not been claimed until _lastPeriodNumber

params._amount: Amount of cUSD tokens to deposit.

donateToCommunity(address,uint256).details: Transfers cUSD tokens to the community contract

params._amount: amount of cUSD tokens to deposit

returns._0: uint256 number of the reward period
uint256 reward that donor will receive in current reward period if there isn't another donation

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

returns._0: uint256 amount of cUSD donated by the user in this reward period

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._newClaimDelay: Number of reward periods a donor has to wait after                            a donation until he will be able to claim his reward

ClaimDelayUpdated(uint256,uint256).notice: Triggered when the claimDelay address has been updated

DonationAdded(uint256,address,uint256,ad.notice: Triggered when a donation has been added

RewardClaimed(address,uint256).notice: Triggered when a donor has claimed his reward

RewardPeriodParamsUpdated(uint256,uint25.notice: Triggered when reward period params have been updated

TransferERC20(address,address,uint256).notice: Triggered when an amount of an ERC20 has been transferred from this contract to an address

TreasuryUpdated(address,address).notice: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated

calculateClaimableRewards(address).notice: Calculates the rewards from ended reward periods of a donor

calculateClaimableRewardsByPeriodNumber(.notice: Calculates the rewards from ended reward periods of a donor

claimRewards().notice: Transfers to the sender the rewards

donate(uint256).notice: Transfers cUSD tokens to the treasury contract

donorRewardPeriod(address,uint256).notice: Returns a reward period number from a donor reward period list

estimateClaimableReward(address).notice: Calculates the estimate reward of a donor for current reward period

rewardPeriodDonorAmount(uint256,address).notice: Returns the amount of cUSD donated by a user in a reward period

transfer(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers an amount of an ERC20 from this contract to an address
